lines.text: Before the station wagon, the beautiful home, and the day you see your name in lights, there must be a period of struggle, study. and hardship commonly known to the trade as your 'salad days.'
Ah, yes, Broadway. The original hardened artery. Long known as the double-crossroads of the world, Broadway is also the Acropolis of the actor. In other words, the home of the ham.
